titleStmt.title: European peace treaties of the pre-modern era in data / Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne in Daten (FriVer+)
Vertrag von Perosa über die Protektion aufständischer Gebiete

editionStmt.edition: Digital edition according to TEI P5

editor.note: The transformation and enrichment of the data is done by Jaap Geraerts (IEG Mainz). The other members of the FriVer+ team are Fabian Cremer, Ines Grund, and Thorsten Wübbena (all IEG Mainz).

The original data has been created by the team of scholars who were part of the Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne project. This project was lead by Prof. Dr. Heinz Duchhardt and was based at the Leibniz Institute of European History in Mainz.

licence.p: This file is licensed under the terms of the Creative Commons License CC-BY 4.0 (Attribution 4.0 International)

sourceDesc.repository: Paris AAE Traités et Accords de la France. Digital: https://basedoc.diplomatie.gouv.fr/exl-php/recherche/mae_internet___traites Numéro du traité: 17040003

msDesc.p: AAE Paris: M.A.E. Traités. Savoie 17040003. Traité mettant sous la protection du roi de France les vallées de Saint-Martin, Pommaret, Envers, Prisache et Chemenière, érigées en République.- La Pérouse, 3 juillet 1704.- original fehlt. Ratification du traité par Louis XIV, roi de France.- Versailles, 25 juillet 1704.

projectDesc.p: The data in this XML file, originally created by the project Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne online has been transformed in accordance with TEI P5 as part of the project Europäische Friedensverträge der Vormoderne in Daten (FriVer+)
